text_block_list.text: A day off. I was heading back to Funabashi for a change of pace……

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text: Huh, Trainer? What a coincidence.

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text: If you're here then……maybe.
choice_data_list: Are you heading to Funabashi too?
Are you heading to Funabashi too?

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
As I thought……! Um, if you'd like, how about going together? 
I was thinking of wandering around the town too……
choice_data_list: Oooh, it really is a coincidence……!

text_block_list.text:
And so, we decided to go around Funabashi together! And after 
transferring trains, we disembarked in our nostalgic hometown.

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text: Aahh……! We're back, Funabashi.

Nostalgic scenery, and a nostalgic atmosphere. 
I came back every now and then, but even then it was still calming.

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
It really feels like 『We're back』 
This atmosphere is really relaxing.

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
That's right, how about we visit the places we have 
shared memories of? Since we're here together after all.
choice_data_list: Sounds good, let's go!

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
Haa, haa, haa……just kidding. 
This is where I always headed to when running.
choice_data_list: You ran here everyday, huh?

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
Yes. You'd follow after me on your bicycle…… 
Even early in the summer mornings when it 
would be hot and humid. It was tough, wasn't it?

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
And then in the winter, when it would be cold 
and dark……you'd carry that big light in the 
basket on your bike. It must have been heavy.
choice_data_list: It wouldn't have been safe otherwise
It wouldn't have been safe otherwise

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text: Is that so……?

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
Ah, here's one. 
Seeing one this size is pretty rare.

Saying that, the thing she had picked up was often 
called 『Sea Glass』. Bits of glass that had been 
weathered by the waves until they became smooth.
choice_data_list: You've been gathering them for a while
You've been gathering them for a while

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, and I've organized them based on color. 
This kind of simple shine……yeah.

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
The decades it must have spent tumbling against 
rocks and sand, slowly being polished, eventually 
refined down until it's such a small piece……

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text: Eventually making its way to Funabashi……!
choice_data_list: That's what you think about!?

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text: Huh, did I never talk about it?

Even though we've been together for so long, 
there are still some things I don't know about her.
choice_data_list: (I would have never known……)
(I would have never known……)

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
Doesn't it seem so improbable? After floating around 
the world's oceans, to finally end up in Funabashi.

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
I think it's fate. If you think about it like 
that, it's almost more valuable than any gem.

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
We came to this park really often too. It's so wide that no matter 
how many times you visit, there's always something to see.

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
According to some people, its popularity among tourists is 
comparable to some famous theme parks. Truly inspiring.

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
Now then, if we take the recommended walking route, 
it'll take us 3 to 4 hours. What should we do?
choice_data_list: Is there anywhere you want to see?

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text: Then, I'd like to see the Andersen statue.
choice_data_list: You really liked Andersen's fairy tales

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
Yes, when I was little, my parents used to read them to me. 
You could say this is because of Funabashi too.

Funabashi is a sister city of Andersen's hometown, 
Odense. The park not only has playground equipment, 
but also an exhibit about fairy tales.

The more we walked, the more we felt proud of Funabashi…… 
We enjoyed visiting several other places too.

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
Huu…… the sauce ramen was delicious, wasn't it? 
I've wanted some for so long I couldn't help it.
choice_data_list: Me too!
Me too!

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
It's so tasty, but it's too bad that it isn't that well known in 
Central. 『Is it that good?』 is the surprised question I get.

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text: But you… with you……

After saying that, Furioso fell silent, looking to the side. 
We could see the city of Funabashi, with all its shining lights.

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text: (As I thought, we're really……birds of a feather)

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
(Irreplaceable comrades who both love Funabashi. 
A strong bond born because of Funabashi……!)

Furioso had been silent for quite a while. What exactly was 
she thinking……? I was just a little worried about the silence.
choice_data_list: This nighttime view is beautiful too
This nighttime view is beautiful too

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text: Of course. It's Funabashi, after all.
choice_data_list: It is……

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text: ………Heh.

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
(Ever since my time in Funabashi, I've been indebted to this 
person. Even that bicycle and light were a huge help……)

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
(To have someone with me who cares about Funabashi 
just as much as me is……fortunate? ……A miracle? 
Hmmmm……how should I put it……?)

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text: (……I have no idea……)

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
(But, it doesn't need to be put in to words. 
We're connected through 『Funabashi』)

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text: Umu.

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text: Thank you, Funabashi……

Furioso suddenly expressed her gratitude to Funabashi. 
Was she just grateful for being able to enjoy the day……?

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
Well then, my apartment is over that way…… 
Thank you very much for today.
choice_data_list: Be careful on your way home

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text: Trainer……

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
I'm looking forward to tomorrow too. 
Let's work hard for Funabashi!

It was a radiant smile. She must have been very 
happy to be able to spend time in Funabashi. Her 
dedication to her hometown warmed my heart.

For her dream, for Funabashi, I'll keep working hard! 
……That's what came to mind.

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
(I'm glad Trainer is with me…… 
Meeting that person was truly……)

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
(There's no one else like them. 
We're definitely more in synch than anyone else……)

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text: Heh……
